name: Content to PDF Converter
description: A Publii plugin that adds a floating button to posts, allowing users to convert the post content into a downloadable PDF file.
author: htejera

config.name: pdfIconPosition
config.label: Position of the PDF icon
config.note: Choose whether the PDF download icon should appear on the left or right side of the screen.

config.name: closeButtonBackgroundColor
config.label: Close button background color
config.note: Specify the background color for the close button.

config.name: closeButtonTextColor
config.label: Close button text color
config.note: Specify the text color for the close button.
